project.contribution: UI Developer | Theme Designer | Template Developer | Common UI Error Debugger
project.detail: MDAS will perform real-time data acquisition from deployed DCUs. It will then organize this data within the database using a standardized Common Data format. This ensures efficient data management and facilitates seamless integration for analysis and reporting purposes.
project.Learning: Teamwork, Debugging, Work Performance, Task Management
steps: Designed a modern UI for the admin panel.
Implemented template repository for other backend developers.
Explored multiple libraries for UI enhancements.
Resolved common UI errors and provided training.
